snippet.title: ANVIL - Tokyo Game Show 2021 Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Official Tokyo Game Show cinematic trailer for ANVIL! ANVIL is a cross-platform multiplayer roguelike action shooter. It’s coming to Steam Early Access and Xbox Game Preview later this year. Be sure to wishlist the game and join our Discord server! 
 
Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1487390/ANVIL/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/anvil





#ANVIL #Steam #XBOX #Game #Roguelike #Multiplay
